articles.title: The superior all-rounder among sports cars: the Porsche 911 Turbo S - Porsche Newsroom
articles.description: Porsche is presenting the top-of-the-range model of the 911 series at the IAA Mobility motor show in Munich: an innovative twin-turbo powertrain with T-Hybrid technology makes the new 911 Turbo S the most powerful production 911 to date.
articles.content: The new Porsche 911 Turbo S is following in big footsteps. Its predecessor was already considered the benchmark in the sports car world when it came to combining performance, long-distance comfort, e… [+12222 chars]
